sections.heading: HOW TO PLAY
sections.body:
• Record "next" on one switch and "Speak!" on the other
• Hold up the animal pictures one by one and speak out what is on the card e.g "lion"
• When the switch user hits their switch that says "next" place the picture you are holding down and hold up the next picture in the pile
• When the switch user hits their switch that says "Say it!" you must make the noise of whatever animal you are holding e.g if you're holding a picture of a duck say "quack quack!"
